properties.NAME: Mont Ripley
properties.FACILITY: Neighbourhood : smaller size facility to service population of 10,000 or less
properties.FACILITY_F: De voisinage : petite installation assurant des services à 10 000 résidents ou moins.
properties.DESCRIPT_1: Located in Houghton country. With being the oldest ski area in Michigan, Mont Ripley is a popular site for both Michigan Technological University students and the public.  With a 440’ vertical drop, this ski area provides several trails that are fun for the whole family.

properties.NAME: Mount Bohemia
properties.ADDRESS: 6532 Gay Lac La Belle Rd, Mohawk, MI 49950
properties.FACILITY: Community: mid size facility to service population of 40,000 plus
properties.FACILITY_F: Communautaire : installation de taille moyenne assurant des services à 40 000 résidents ou plus.
properties.DESCRIPT_1: Located next to Lac La Belle, Mount Bohemia boasts a 900’ vertical drop, making it the highest vertical drop in Michigan.  Beware though, Mount Bohemia is not groomed and therefore is not recommended for beginners.

properties.NAME: Voodoo Mountain
properties.ADDRESS: 6532 Gay Lac La Belle Rd, Mohawk, MI 49950
properties.FACILITY: Community: mid size facility to service population of 40,000 plus
properties.FACILITY_F: Communautaire : installation de taille moyenne assurant des services à 40 000 résidents ou plus.
properties.DESCRIPT_1: Located south of Copper Harbor, Voodoo Mountain provides a vertical drop of roughly 700’.  This relatively new ski area provides the first ever snowcat skiing in Michigan.
